explains: n. 美国国会大厦；（美国）州议会大厦
wordGroup: capitol hill 美国国会；美国国会山

sentences.en: The Democrats held a pep rally on Capitol Hill yesterday.
sentences.cn: 民主党昨天在国会山召开了竞选誓师大会。

sentences.en: Thousands of demonstrators rallied in front of the Capitol.
sentences.cn: 成千上万的示威者在美国国会大厦前集会。

sentences.en: This policy had repeatedly come under strong criticism on Capitol Hill.
sentences.cn: 这项政策在国会反复受到强烈批评。
